inclusion.criterion: Each subject qualified by entry criteria history in a brief phone interview will be invited to come to a screening visit.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A brief history and targeted physical exam to obtaining informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Males or non-pregnant, non-lactating females who are post-menopausal or naturally or surgically sterile
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be willing and able to give written informed consent and must provide this consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who are normally active and otherwise judged to be in good health
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Off allergy medication for at least one month prior to study entry (nasal corticosteroids, nasal azelastine, cromolyn sodium, IPRATROPRIUM bromide, antihistamines, leukotriene antagonists)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be willing and able to attend required study visits
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be able to follow instructions
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of allergy symptoms August to January
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a documented positive serum MPO-ANCA in his medical record, indicating an autoimmune disorder. He is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides for Wegener's granulomatosis.
